experience: You and Jera both know Erika Flora PMP, PgMP, ITIL Expert,PRINCE2,CSP, Josh Huckabee, and 53 others

Yesterday, we participated in the Great ShakeOut Earthquake Drill at our California offices at 10:19 AM PST. 'Participating in this drill is a great way for your organization to be prepared to survive and recover quickly from big earthquakes.' Needless to say we had a great success in our ShakeOut drill which was followed up with (milk)shakes for all of our employees who participated. Pictured below is two of the ice cream trucks we had on campus with lines showing how much of a hit this drill and the (milk)shakes were. Thank you to everyone who participated and to our Safety Committee and Seth Connors, for making this possible!

Thanks to everyone in San Diego for making our first Teach for America School Supply Drive a success last month! We collected 1,886 items that went to teachers and students in low income school districts, providing valuable resources they may not otherwise have access to. This was the first time TFA San Diego collaborated with local companies to raise donations, and Mitchell FAR exceeded contributions from other participants. TFA was incredibly impressed with Mitchell’s commitment to supporting the community and so appreciative of our generosity. Thank you to everyone who donated!

Last week, we had a Panel Discussion with the Women of our Executive Leadership Team. The panel included Debbie Day (EVP, GM of Auto Physical Damage), Nina Smith (EVP, GM of Casualty Solutions Group), MG Kristian (SVP, People & Workplace) and Stephanie Kroon (SVP, General Counsel). The Mitchell employees who attended the panel were given an opportunity to listen to these four accomplished women who shared how they deal with stress, balancing work and life, their journey in becoming an executive, and more. The panel was a success in inspiring women at Mitchell that becoming an executive is possible!

We are looking for 2 Enterprise Software Architects to join both our Auto Physical Damage (APD) Team and our Casualty Solutions Group (CSG). Experience with OOP languages is required. Please message me for more details or apply directly on our careers page!

I had the pleasure of working beside Jera as a Technical Recruiter for Robert Half Technology. By the time I had joined the team, she had been there for almost a year. Not only did she make me feel comfortable as a new member of the team, but she generously lent her expertise to help me reach my own potential as a recruiter. She adds positivity, enthusiasm, and new ideas to help meet and exceed goals. I have no doubt she will add value to wherever she decides to go next. I would highly recommend her.
